Starstomp: I don't think there's much else to do here then look for 
survivor, except maybe bring the ship back online. The thing is I 
doubt we have what it takes for this. Let's move together. It'll be 
safer than everybody on its own. I suggest we move unarmed, so we wont 
be considered as hostiles. And... if we find any dead... we should 
bring them outside and pay them their due respect...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> Nighlight loked to Aerotaur and Starstomp and said "What will should 
do? should be good idea search the surviviors together or not"
